azureSpringCloud.description: An Azure Spring Cloud extension for Visual Studio Code.
azureSpringCloud.enableOutputTimestamps: Prepends each line displayed in the output channel with a timestamp.
azureSpringCloud.deleteConfirmation: The behavior to use when confirming delete of a resource group.
azureSpringCloud.deleteConfirmation.Ente: Prompts with an input box where you enter the resource group name to delete.
azureSpringCloud.deleteConfirmation.Clic: Prompts with a warning dialog where you click a button to delete.
